metadata.description: Excellent grades · Excellent athletic eminence · Very popular · student, Yuzen Shindo fell in love with the beauty of the cool student council chairman Rei Omiya at first sight.  Yuzen fell for Rei when he realized that he was lovely because of his pride.  Yuzen expression of love is dynamic and erotic.  Rei is always drawing away from him.  Well they do say that opposites attract! High school love comedy!
metadata.name: LOVE!! (Yaoi Manga)
